message.content: {"given_definition_quality":80,"better_definition":"to want or need to do something; must","sentence":"我要去。","image_prompt":"A single young adult walking purposefully forward with hand raised as if stating intention to leave, in a softly apocalyptic, animated world—faded buildings in the distance and a moody, glowing sky. The mood is hopeful yet mysterious. Emphasize the figure's determined expression. Style: soft apocalypse animation.","sentence_translation":"I want to go."}
